author: MSNBC
title: Biden’s bind: No good options on Russia
description: President Joe Biden brought his pen to a war. Now, he has to hope it will prove mightier than Russian resolve.
content:
President Joe Biden brought his pen to a war. Now, he has to hope it will prove mightier than Russian resolve.
